title: Toward Trustworthy Agentic AI: A Multimodal Framework for Preventing Prompt Injection Attacks
dimension: Adaptation to Rapidly Evolving AI Threat Landscape
summary: Powerful autonomous systems, which reason, plan, and converse using and between numerous tools and agents, are made possible by Large Language Models (LLMs), Vision-Language Models (VLMs), and new agentic AI systems, like LangChain and GraphChain.
